title: Boogaloo Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Japanese, Buffet, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This outlet is near Kyoto University at Hyakumanben, at 京都市左京区吉田泉殿町4-13. Offers a variety of alcohol and food items. Lunch special comes with bread and includes 2 vegetarian sets: salad and green pasta. Note that some bread contain meat, so ask.
